optimization_cache.title: Optimization Cache URL
optimization_cache.description: S3 Storage URL including credentials and bucket

ident.title: Youtube ID(s)
ident.description: Youtube ID(s) of the handle, channel, user, or playlist(s) to ZIM (depending on the Type chosen below). Only playlist Type support multiple Youtube IDs and they must be separated by commas.

language.title: Language
language.description: ISO-639-3 (3 chars) language code of content

name.title: ZIM Name
name.description: Used as identifier and filename (date will be appended)

zim_file.title: ZIM Filename
zim_file.description: ZIM file name (optional, based on ZIM Name if not provided). Include {period} to insert date period dynamically

title.title: ZIM Title
title.description: Custom title for your ZIM. Default to Channel name (of first video if playlists)

long_description.title: ZIM Long Description
long_description.description: Long description (up to 4000 chars) for ZIM

creator.title: Content Creator
creator.description: Name of content creator. Defaults to Channel name or "Youtube Channels"

tags.title: ZIM Tags
tags.description: List of comma-separated Tags for the ZIM file. _videos:yes added automatically

dateafter.title: Only after date
dateafter.description: Custom filter to download videos uploaded on or after specified date. Format: YYYYMMDD or (now|today)[+-][0-9](day|week|month|year)(s)?

video_format.title: Video format
video_format.description: Format to download/transcode video to. webm is smaller

use_any_optimized_version.title: Use any optimized version
use_any_optimized_version.description: Use the cached files if present, whatever the version

pagination.title: Pagination
pagination.description: Number of videos per page (40 otherwise)

profile.title: Profile Image
profile.description: Custom profile image. Squared. Will be resized to 100x100px

banner.title: Banner Image
banner.description: Custom banner image. Will be resized to 1060x175px

main_color.title: Main Color
main_color.description: Custom color. Hex/HTML syntax (#DEDEDE). Default to main color of profile image.

secondary_color.title: Secondary Color
secondary_color.description: Custom secondary color. Hex/HTML syntax (#DEDEDE). Default to secondary color of profile image.

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Expert flag: Number of concurrent threads to use

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file(s). Leave it as `/output`

stats_filename.title: Stats filename
stats_filename.description: Scraping progress file. Leave it as `/output/task_progress.json`

tmp_dir.title: Temp folder
tmp_dir.description: Where to create temporay build folder. Leave it as `/output`
